page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE IN GT. WAKERING
page.content: MOST PEOPLE HAVE A FAVOURITE FOOD, MINE IS CHINESE AND INDIAN THINGS. ENTERTAINMENT IS ALSO IMPORTANT. IN MY HOUSE IT IS THE COMPUTER, T.V. AND VIDEO. I LIKE LIVING HERE BECAUSE ALL MY FRIENDS LIVE HERE." MOST PEOPLE OWN A TELEVISION SET AND MANY HAVE VIDEO TAPE RECORDERS AND COMPUTERS. THEY GO AWAY ON HOLIDAY AS A FAMILY ONCE EACH YEAR AND TAKE DAY TRIPS ONCE OR TWICE EACH WEEK IN THE SUMMER. THE PARENTS EAT OUT QUITE OFTEN AND THEY DO THEIR SHOPPING ONCE A WEEK AT THE LOCAL HYPERMARKET. THE CHILDREN DO NOT WORK BUT THEY ARE EXPECTED TO HELP WITH THE JOBS AROUND THE HOUSE ALTHOUGH MANY OF THEM ADMIT TO DOING VERY LITTLE TO EARN THE POCKET MONEY WHICH THEY GET EACH WEEK TO BUY THINGS WITH.
